caption.p: *Direct Mauna Loa measurements (NOAA ESRL Global Monitoring Division (2016).

Retrieved from Northwest Alliance for Computational Science & Engineering database. For Canadian Climate Data: Government of Canada (Ed.). (2018, January 11).
